var statusMsg = "Current Time        " + msg.timeStamp
statusMsg += "\nError: Command not recognized.\nTank Levels=1\nReset Alarms=2\nSetpoints=3\nView Status=4\nAckAlarm=9"
    
msg.payload = statusMsg
return msg;

name: Alarm Acknowledge
send ack text message to other users

payload: Hello, this is the Hannathon Conroe Callout Alarm Number.  SMS alarms will come from this. You can text this number '1' for site status, '2' to reset alarms, '3' for setpoints, '4' for Tank Levels, '9' to acknowledge alarms.  If you are receiving this in error or need help, please contact Mark Cowan 8172473760 or Will Wylie 4695822274 #0.  Text 'STOP' to stop messages and 'START' to start messages if they were previously stopped.

name: Comm Status Cache
func:
var m = "Current Time        " + msg.timeStamp
m += "\nGRBP Limerock Post Estate\n"

var scadaCommAlarm = flow.get("scadaCommAlarm")

        
        flow.set("scadaCommAlarmDate", msg.timeStamp)
        m += "Alarm Cleared:  SCADA Communication Now Online"
        msg.payload = m
        return msg

name: CLEAR CACHE
func:
flow.set("Flow", undefined)
flow.set("Levels", undefined)
flow.set("Other", undefined)
flow.set("Status", undefined)
flow.set("Alarms", undefined)
flow.set("Setpoints", undefined)
